comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Kitchens: ovens, stoves, world kitchens..., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
We'd love to have you use it! Just send us a message to tell us a bit about your blog and to let us know when the post is up. 
Tiah
